item.title: Devops Blog Migration to Hugo
item.description: I’ve updated my site to use hugo some time ago but recently added an Azure DevOps pipeline for deploying the thing. This short article will cover how the pipeline code works and dive into multi-stage pipelines.

#DevOps: The Raw Helm Chart The raw helm chart is designed to shove raw kubernetes configuration elements into the application deployment stack. This can be one way to put lifecycle around your cluster configuration and its super handy to have in your toolbelt. The Chart The raw chart is The Example Here is how I use this particular chart to deploy a predefined set of dynamic PVC provisioning types. I basically use it to combine all the preparation work in this guide for Azure Files on AKS
